name: Bastard Sword
description:
Community Game Jam project by Lolerji and Superior One (https://crowdforge.io/profile/Lolerji, https://crowdforge.io/profile/SuperiorOne)

A hero, chasing his adventure, enters the dungeon. Like many before him, he seeks to unravel the misteries hidden inside.

He cuts his way through numerous creatures, fills his pockets with the gold and trinkets long forgotten in the cursed place.

He walks and walks, never to find the path from which he came. The hero becomes scared, he gets hungry, thirsty. He gets tired and in the end, he succumbs to death, his soul forever lost in the cursed dungeon.

His soul, still burning with desire to find salvation, possesses his bastard sword, and looks for a way out once more...

Will it find salvation this time?
